website_summaries.verdict: When you want a holiday tree topper that has a natural look, this is a beautiful choice.
pros: This 5-point star tree topper melds a rustic look with modern LED lighting
The star consists of natural looking rattan, highlighted with 10 LEDs to provide a soothing glow
At 10 inches in height, it won't overwhelm the rest of the Christmas tree
cons: Lead wire is only 60" in length, so a tall tree may need an extension cord

customer_reviews.title: SO happy to find something simple yet elegant to top my tree!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something nice but understated to top my Christmas tree and looked and looked and almost gave up before finding this. Pretty much all the stars and angel tree toppers you find are incredibly gaudy, gold and glittery and over the top obnoxious. If you want something simple yet elegant that looks natural on top of the tree, I highly recommend this star. I'm so glad I found it! It has also lasted for several years now.
customer_reviews.author: Kate MahoneyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Rustic!
customer_reviews.text: Love this star! Bright and rustic and perfect for our tree. It has a long cord which is awesome because it runs all the way down the back of the tree to the outlet. I prefer that it’s not battery powered. It is not super durable so don’t let your kids play with it haha which is fine because it just goes on top of the tree! We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gilles2016

customer_reviews.title: Cutest star
customer_reviews.text: Love this star!!! The cone at the base of the star is really narrow and you can’t really get a tree bristle inside of it to stand straight. So I just laid the star on top of the tree and in front of the tallest bristle and it worked out great. The electrical cord is so long which is nice if you don’t have an available outline on the tree. My tree is 7ft and it reached the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful natural tree topper
customer_reviews.text: I can’t usually keep up with my reviews but I do feel like I should give this one right away especially that it’s still very much in season. This is a very beautiful tree topper. Size is perfect and we have a 6ft slim farmhouse style tree. I like it very much that it’s lighted it’s even more beautiful when it is. The cord is hassle free since it’s long enough for our tree. It’s very well made and a real keeper. It’s perfect for farmhouse and rustic decorations. I’m so happy with it and it’s not the typical ones you’d see in stores that costs more but do look kind of cheap. Get this one, you’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: May@36

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this item
customer_reviews.text: We put this star on top of our artificial 8ft tree. I had read reviews expressing difficulty getting it to stay straight. I was having that issue and decided to cut 2 fingers out of a rubber glove and place them over the stump end at the top of our tree. This made the plastic cone that came with the star fit much more securely and then I inserted the star into the cone and it is very straight. The star itself is attractive, looks exactly like the photo. I like it a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, base is a "fit all" shape and size, warm glow light temp
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece for design and fit our tree motif perfectly. The mount is "fit all" and ends up only fitting just the right size tree top. We do natural trees so this changes every year. This is light enough and easy to tie to that top branch whatever it may pose for shape and size each year. The lights are traditional mini-lights and so give a warm yellow hue versus some of the blue white of many new LED light strings. We liked the difference. Although I may wire in a few of the matching LED lights next time to best integrate to the rest of the tree. Absolutely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PBD

customer_reviews.title: Great for large tree
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new star for our 8 foot tree. I was worried that this one would be too small but it's perfect. I don't think it would be too big for a 6 foot tree either. It has a home made look being as it's made from straw. Price was right too. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and simple
customer_reviews.text: this tree star is exactly what I was looking for. add perfectly to any style tree since it’s so neutral and has clear lights to add elegance. very classy. I had to use a zip tie to keep on my tree. chord isn’t super long but we plugged It in to another string of lights and it worked out well for us. very sturdy not flimsy. thankyou!!!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Cute Rustic Topper
customer_reviews.text: We really loved this on top of our rustic tree last Christmas. I ordered one, but it arrived damaged on the top. Not sure if this was due to a careless employee or a design flaw. Once I got my replacement though it was nearly perfect. We did struggle a bit to affix it to the top of the tree, but I found some tree-green zip ties and rigged it up that way. We got a lot of compliments about it too!
customer_reviews.author: StL_Queen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Rustic
customer_reviews.text: Cute and rustic tree topper. Cord for plugging into tree lights is long enough to to go down the tree a good bit - in case you wrapped your lights up the tree and back down like we did. The only thing that was cheap was the green mounting thing. It's cheap and doesn't fit the star or tree tightly, so we just ended up sticking a branch through the star.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Manguno

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 Christmas seasons
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of 2017, and it looked pretty good once/if you're able to balance it on top of the tree well enough. We used it again this year (2018) but after the first week the star no longer worked. We tried replacing the fuses with the extra one that was originally sent with star, but no luck. Two years sounds pretty good but if you consider that it's only been used periodically over a cumulative couple of weeks, it's a pretty horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: JPBearcat

customer_reviews.title: Once mounted and lit up, it looks glorious. ...
customer_reviews.text: Once mounted and lit up, it looks glorious. It's a bit fragile feeling right out of the box (so keep your kids' hands away from it). And it's weight might cause some drooping atop the tree. To solve this, I filled the connector that slides onto the tree top with Playdoh and it created a firm grip.
customer_reviews.author: SGreenstreet

customer_reviews.title: Lovely star!
customer_reviews.text: Although I would have preferred a cheaper star, I got the attached because of the lights in it. It’s truly a great addition to my first tree in our new place. I didn’t use the green plastic part because our tree tip was too weak to support it. Instead, we wrapped our tree lights around the star to secure it to the tree. I would say this star would work best on a larger, more sturdy, tree than the one I have. Overall, a stunning piece that made my tree look wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: sno216

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this star. It lights up beautifully! This year I didn’t use the holder to put it on the top of our tree instead I just rested it in the top of the tree and it looks beautiful. Would definitely buy this again, so happy to have a simple beautiful star topper and such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our tree!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the style of this tree topper and it worked incredibly well on our tree. No sagging or difficulty of any kind and it has a nice rustic style with burlap garland. Definitely worth the money and was a better price than Target for a similar topper.
customer_reviews.author: Mia bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two years then quit working
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty while it lasted but it only lasted two holiday seasons and then the lights quit. I tried changing lights and fuses and nothing worked. I took the strand of lights off and the star still looks nice on the tree but I’m pretty disappointed that it quit working after only two years.
customer_reviews.author: B. Laska

customer_reviews.title: Light up and long cord
customer_reviews.text: This was very nice and really pulled the whole tree together. It lights up and has a long enough cord to reach the plug in. The only problem was trying to get it to sit straight on the top with the stand that came with it but we just literally stuck the tree up in it instead of using the stand. Worked like a charm. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Shelb

customer_reviews.title: Rustic Topper, Perfect for 4.5 ft Tree
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an unlit star topper on our 4.5 ft holiday tree. The size was perfect and the rustic, hewn rattan star fit our tree design. In person (not sure it shows well in this photo) the lights have a slight yellow tinge so it slightly contrasts with our bright white tree lights. At replacement time I will try to find ones of a matching hue. Recommend based on price and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sesser

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it 10 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tree star. It is perfect to complement rustic Christmas decor. As other reviewers have noted, it was a bit hard to put on, but I just bent the top stem of the tree in half and then it seem to be fine. Highly highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RUSSELL HANCOCK

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my 3 year old was bummed that we didn't have a star. He was super excited. The star looks amazing and was easy to get on the tree. We didn't have an issue with it tilting at all. It looks great and my son is happy.
customer_reviews.author: dmc

customer_reviews.title: A family favorite
customer_reviews.text: We bought this star in a store over 10 years ago and it was out first Christmas tree topper as a newlywed couple. We pulled it out this year and the lights were dead on it so we began the process of trying to pick a new one and let the kids vote. This is the one we all decided upon and it was a pretty simple choice. Couldn't be happier and not a bad life for the first star.
customer_reviews.author: Bozfam

customer_reviews.title: Good but somewhat heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall look of this tree topper. It's rustic and looks very quality, but it is quite weighty, and it took two sturdy top branches to support it upright without drooping after a day or two. Honestly, I would probably not buy it again if I were to do it again just because of how long it took to rig it up on top of the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Stressed Grad Student

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace our existing star. I missed the light-up star from childhood, so i thought this would be fun. This is a nice size and the lights are great (I thought it wouldn't be enough lights, but after setting it on the top, it was just perfect!) The rattan seems a bit "crafty" but on the tree it is subtle and harmonious with the tree. I really do like it - very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sss

customer_reviews.title: Great star!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and simple... it matched my rustic chic Christmas theme perfectly. The start doesn’t fit perfectly on the green piece that is supposed to sit on the top of the tree, it took a bit of adjusting but otherwise it worked great. The lights are warm and bright. The cord is long enough to plug into lights and decorate a tree with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: looks great but doesnt set up as is too to heavy and the mount doesnt tightly fit to the tree or the topper. had to use high tensile wire to keep it from falling over or off but it was worth the effort it was stunning on top of the tree this year
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! I did all white/silver/gold tree this year and the star was very pretty. I normally do all color and all decorations. I’ll do that again next year but I think the star will still go with all the colors.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree topper!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautifully made for the price. It is simple, yet ellegant. Be aware you will probably need an extension cord, unless your tree has a plug for a tree topper. Our tree does not have a plug, we used an extension cord. The star is so pretty I don't mind. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and great value for the money. I give it 4 stars because I would only get this for artificial tree as the top is hard to attach unless you can manipulate the wire tree to hold it up.
customer_reviews.author: David Calfee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and rustic.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone says easy to install, however the piece that came with it was too narrow to fit over my tree top which is pretty standard size (I thought). I used a large bead tie and it worked. It's very pretty and rustic. Matches my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: This star looks great on top of the tree. I am a little disappointed in the piece that holds the star on the top branch. Its really flimsy and isn't attached to the star. If its leaning slightly it'll fall right out.
customer_reviews.author: CathyS

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: We love this star. It’s beautiful & looks perfect on our tree. The only thing we don’t love about it is it’s base: so the green base comes as a separate piece & it’s fairly large for the top of a tree. It isn’t sturdy enough to place on a smaller limb on top... so we have to cut a piece of our tree off to make it fit. It worked, I would just rather have a base that is a little better fitted for limbs. Other than that; it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids requested a Star this year in place of my childhood angel tree topper. After reading lots of reviews, comparing sizes etc - I went with this one. Very happy with it and excited to use it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: N. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It looks lovely. The only problem is the base ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks lovely. The only problem is the base is just a plastic cone, and is fairly wobbly, and I have to pack in paper and other materials around the branch inside the base to keep it secure.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.text: Mine was broken when I received it. It looked like someone cut off the ends of the sticks on two sides and didn’t include enough lights to light up each end of the “Star”. Super flimsy....does not stay straight up on the top of the tree. I tried wire and glue but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sticka

customer_reviews.title: rustic and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this rustic star made of twigs. Yes its fragile but most stars for the top of the tree are fragile. Exactly what I was looking for. It did tip a little bit to the side because my tree top is only 6 ft. tall, so I cut a piece of branch off and stuck it inside to give it bulk. You can also add cardboard or anything else if needed. Love this rustic star!
customer_reviews.author: opiz

customer_reviews.title: The star is perfect for a 7ft tree
customer_reviews.text: The star is perfect for a 7ft tree. We’ve been searching for one for a while, but this star fits our tree perfectly and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Star as a gift for my nephew and his girlfriend for their Christmas Tree.They both really love it. And for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Sallysunshine1111

customer_reviews.title: I love my tree topper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tree topper! So cute and rustic and different. Great value for the price and arrived less than 24 hours after I ordered it. I love amazon and their products, and this ones no exception!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Tessmer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and aesthetic!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive buying this tree topper because of the reviews that said it was not sturdy enough and wouldn’t stay on the top of the tree. However I was pleasantly surprised when I received it! Not only was it sturdy, it didn’t require any kind of alterations to make it stay on the top of the tree! We love the rustic look of it!
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this looks but for some reason when we plug it into our prelit tree it does not light up. It has to be plugged in separately.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney1994

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly with my theme this year. Rustic and beautifully made. It is a little weird to fit on the top of the tree but we made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Cute but you’ll have to craft a way to secure it
customer_reviews.text: Cute but you’ll have to craft a way to secure it. We will have to zip-tie it I think. The plastic holder seems to be too small.
customer_reviews.author: QualityMatters

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This tree topper is a very nice touch. It's got a nice natural look with warm white lights and the cord is plenty long to reach an outlet close by. Buy it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. I put up a "rustic" tree this year
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I put up a "rustic" tree this year, using a snow-flocked tree, red birds, owl, etc. I ordered this tree topper because I thought it would go well with my woodsy-type tree decorations. It worked beautifully. It looks like grapevines woven together in the shape of a star, and is prelit with white lights. It is a substantial size, and looks great on my 7 1/2' tree. If you are looking for something vintage, you will enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. It lights up and it looks really pretty. It has a rustic look to it which I really like. I'm so excited to use this this year.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: It never fell off though so I'm still glad that I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: This was just the right topper that I was looking for! My only complaint is that the green piece that goes over the bottom to put on the top of the tree was very small and didn't allow for us to put the tree into it so we had to set it on the top couple branches. It never fell off though so I'm still glad that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Zero star
customer_reviews.text: They make you leave a star to add a review.. Unsatisfied with this product, I was unable to use the plug. The plastic cheap holder that is on the bottom does not fit on any tree branch. Attempted to just use the product without but it looks tacky. Wouldn’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Tree ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on my tree and I love it!! Love the old fashioned/hand made look. Nice and light weight, it doesn’t weigh my tree top down. Used a bread tie to hold in place since instead of the plastic thing that came with since I didn’t want to cut any of the top off since the tree was already small enough for my taste:) Perfect for me and my tree!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura9003

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 6ft tree
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Perfect size for my 6ft tree. Well made, cord to plug in is plenty long; its brown so it can easily be hidden inside the branches of the tree. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Erin - TN

customer_reviews.title: Simply GORGEOUS!!
customer_reviews.text: The best STAR tree top I've ever bought! Love it so much that I feel like buying another one just in case this one ever breaks. But it's very well made out of twigs.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit
customer_reviews.text: You gotta get creative with putting this star up and making it stay. The tube it comes with is the right idea, but it doesnt fit the top branch on my standard fake tree.
customer_reviews.author: Scootaloo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Like it more if it was a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good topper. I’d like if the lights were more evenly spaced and secured, but they aren’t difficult to move around. Kind of resembles something out of “The Wicker Man”
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lit star ! Perfect for my woodsy tree! Great price on this product. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Vizslamom

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the rustic look of my tree topper! It is sturdy, and make out of authentic branches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I taped the popsicle sticks to the mounting stick like an upside down V
customer_reviews.text: Has two ways to mount on trees. I chose this star because it had a stick but I had to improvise the mounting stick with popsicle sticks. I taped the popsicle sticks to the mounting stick like an upside down V. That way it stuck solidly into the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Insert Doesn't Fit Tree
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and all lights worked, but plastic insert doesn't fit on treetop branch well so I had to just lean it against some branches to get it to stand up.
customer_reviews.author: Madison B

customer_reviews.title: Great star
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rustic star for the price. My husband had to play around with it to get it to stay on top I was afraid it was too flimsy at first but overall loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this star this past Christmas. Really looked great on the tree. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rustic tree topper, tube is a bit small for top
customer_reviews.text: So I didn’t use the tree topper plastic job to put on the tree as it was too small however it looks awesome and rustic, which is what I wanted. I propped it at the top of the tree and looks great and works well!
customer_reviews.author: blueskiesed

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be brighter.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. I like the style. I wish there were more lights on it though. I was replacing an old Star that broke. The lights were still good on the old one, so I added them to this one and it looks much better.
customer_reviews.author: Meg B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but it’s too heavy to stay on the tree. I zip tied it my tree and am fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I love this rustic star! I know there are reviews that said, it's to heavy, it's crooked... blah, blah! To those people I have never had a tree topper that I didn't have to work with. Worth the money and not tacky looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Natural Star
customer_reviews.text: Loved this natural wooden star!! It was somewhat heavy for my artificial tree limbs, but I was able to stabilize it! It’s nice and natural😊
customer_reviews.author: karen F.

customer_reviews.title: it’s not the best but it’s worth $14
customer_reviews.text: So I gotta say, it’s not the best but it’s worth $14. Our tree looks so much better with that star on top! The only reason I took one star away is that green holder is kinda cheap. The star didn’t stay still with that holder so we didn’t use it; we ended up bending the tree top and sticking the star on our tree:( But hey, it worked and it wasn’t only $14 so!!
customer_reviews.author: James Wooster

customer_reviews.title: So that's annoying. We used a chip clip
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to attach it to your tree. So that's annoying. We used a chip clip.
customer_reviews.author: krysann joye

customer_reviews.title: nice simple star
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was simple not gaudy , also liked that the cord had plenty of length. I didn't car as much for the way it attaches to the tree, if the top branch isn't large enough it makes for too loose of a fit, making it hand crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Chainlaker

customer_reviews.title: Naturally beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for over 3 years for a tree topper. In our log home we have cabin decorations on our tree. This was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly rustic...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. Works perfectly on my rustic tree, pulls the whole look together.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's small tree; however, it was so beautiful, I almost stole it for our big tree ;-) Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: meech1k

customer_reviews.title: Yellow lights
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a more rustic feel for my Christmas tree so I went with this star and I really like it. I just wish I realized it was yellow lights before I put white lights on my tree.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Berke

customer_reviews.title: Super cute rustic style!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put up! Has a normal plug to attach to lights. Our pre lit tree didn’t have a plug at the top for a star (weird) so we ran a cheap extension cord up and it worked perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Woodsy Star - Love It
customer_reviews.text: I like it - it works perfectly on my tall skinny tree for our lake house with the vaulted ceiling. Fits the décor.
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with This Star
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my rustic Christmas tree, well made and arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Tree topper
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Worked great on my tree last year. Sturdy tree topper, just as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Schnitker

customer_reviews.title: Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: It's cute! The lights are a little disappointing, but I added some more to it. I love the rustic look of the star.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Marabe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on tree
customer_reviews.text: Love this star. Love all Kurt Adler..makes good sturdy things
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well and looks great on my tree. It’s a little smaller than I thought, but I’m still happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: timbocf

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works great. Bought as replacement of exact same that I dropped from top of tree last year. Replaced bulbs on the old one but I must have really messed it up because it kept on blowing bulbs every few minutes. For this price it was worth buying a new one rather than fiddling with the old one. It's a great topper...just don't drop it from 8' up like I did.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: You will not regret it! Its absolutely beautiful, sturdy and it stands out perfectly. I have a 7.5 ft tall tree and it fit just right!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra O

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Only two things
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Only two things, doesn’t sit evenly on top so it’s crooked and not a long enough cord. Had to use an extension cord from inside tree to outlet. Otherwise, it is a beautiful tree topper!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for the new tree we got this year
customer_reviews.author: Elicia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect star for a rustic country tree
customer_reviews.text: I love this star! It took a moment to figure out how to get it to stay on the tree, but it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AshLee

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on tree
customer_reviews.text: Very well made lights are great just kinda heavy for smaller trees
customer_reviews.author: lawrence adams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Star looks great on our tree. It was a little tricky to get on but overall it’s a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Alesha Weigl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and modest looking
customer_reviews.text: Matches our country decor, a lite tricky to keep it upright, had to snip the tip of the artificial tree to wedge it on.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I like this because it is so different from the typical ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it is so different from the typical tree topper you see, but there is no mechanism for putting it place. We had to fashion something and it still did not look quite right. Otherwise, I think it's a good purchase (if you can think of a better way to make it stay at the top!).
customer_reviews.author: mouse

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is Exactly what I was wanting. Looks perfect on our tree.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W

customer_reviews.title: the little holder for the star is garbage and loose
customer_reviews.text: It's a much darker wood than the picture, the little holder for the star is garbage and loose; the star wobbles around and almost falls out. The cord is too short for any tree more than 4 feet. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: fmf

customer_reviews.title: Love this star! Don’t use the green stem..
customer_reviews.text: Love this star! Totally worth what I paid. I didn’t use the green stem mostly because it didn’t hold the star properly and made it lean. However, I bent the top portion of my artificial tree and was able to make a hole out of that garland and fit the star right through making it stand straight.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Ramirez-Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Get some garland to hide the mount!
customer_reviews.text: Put some garland around the mount and you should be good! Looks great! Not over the top, a subtle beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Greingo

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Looked so cute on our tree!! I rigged the topper with a clip from our old star because the top of our tree wasn’t wide enough. But it worked great after a few minutes of fiddling.
customer_reviews.author: FStad

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Used this for Christmas and it looked wonderful! only negative is it isn't very secure on top of the tree and it kept sliding lopsided. After I moved some branches to hold the star it was much better but still wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Base is awful
customer_reviews.text: The base is flimsy, won’t hold the ornament in it, and doesn’t fit the top of our tree. Haven’t put it up yet because I need to buy some brown or green duct tape to be able to attach it without looking horrible. The star looks nice by itself, but useless right now. Also, wish the cord was longer
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: No tree attachment
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with anything to attach to tree, just a small stick coming out of bottom of the star, had to use garden wire to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: Brockus hake

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace the other radlar that I’ve had for about 15 years and lights had gone out. This one is nice and I like the traditional look of it
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Hard to place on tree. Only has a flimsy plastic cone on the end. Will make tree top heavy and fall over. You will need some twist ties or a hair clip to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice but won’t fit on top of tree
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tree topper and it looks exactly as described. I only gave it a 3, because the tip is too small to fit over the top tree branch. I had to zip tie it to the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Lori V.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I have no complaints. looked great on the tree!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan and Tasha C

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today. Pleased with this star. Took lights out as I want it unlit on our rustic tree. Nice
customer_reviews.author: grogro

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this star
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this star! and the lights are perfect! The only downside is the way that it stands on my tree. The stand isn't very sturdy, and our star swivels sometimes. But other than that, great star!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rivera

product_meta.title: Kurt Adler 10 Light Indoor Rattan Natural Star Treetop
product_meta.description: This Kurt Adler 10-light rattan natural star treetop is a unique way to decorate your Christmas tree and accent its lighting. Made of rattan, or palms, this tree topper has a rough-yet-beautiful natural look, and it is wrapped in brown wire with light bulbs to give off a warm glow. For indoor use only, this set comes with a 60-Inch brown lead wire, a 12-volt 0.08a clear bulb, 4 bulbs, and 1 fuse.
feature_bullets: Includes 4 spare bulbs and 1 spare R41 fuse
Attaches to tree by a green plastic base
